NAME: base-devel
PURPOSE: [basic] Basic package including tools needed for building compiling and linking.

NAME: cronie
PURPOSE: [basic] Runs specified programs at scheduled times and related tools.

NAME: rsync
PURPOSE: [basic] Utility for efficiently transferring and synchronizing files across computer systems.

NAME: zsh
PURPOSE: [dotfiles] Extended Bourne shell with a large number of improvements.

NAME: xclip
PURPOSE: [X11] Command line interface to the X11 clipboard.

NAME: xorg-server
PURPOSE: [X11] Display server for the X Window.

NAME: xorg-xinit
PURPOSE: [X11] Program allows a user to manually start an Xorg display server.

NAME: xorg-xdpyinfo
PURPOSE: [X11] Retrieves screen information for some scripts.

NAME: xcompmgr
PURPOSE: [X11] Utility for transparency and removing screen-tearing.

NAME: i3-gaps
PURPOSE: [i3wm] i3wm with gaps as window manager.

NAME: ffmpeg
PURPOSE: [tool] software suite of libraries and programs for handling video audio and other multimedia files and streams.

NAME: screenfetch
PURPOSE: [rice] Bash script that displays system information alongside the ASCII distribution logo.
